title: Tanah rizab Melayu di bandar berpotensi jadi pemacu ekonomi masyarakat Melayu
description: Ahli Lembaga Pemegang Amanah MPI, Mohd Safar Hasim, berpendapat tanah rizab Melayu di kawasan bandar seperti Bandar Malaysia boleh menjadi pemangkin transformasi ekonomi masyarakat Melayu jika diurus secara strategik.

title: Tanahemas Sponsors Local Education Fund for Rural Workers' Children
description: We are proud to announce a new partnership with the 'Bright Future' Foundation to provide scholarships and school supplies.

title: Q3 Production Reports Show Strong Yield Performance
description: Improved agricultural techniques and favorable weather conditions contributed to record-breaking output across our key estates.

title: Tanahemas Seeks Senior Talent for Singapore Regional Office Expansion
description: We are actively hiring for three senior management roles to oversee our growing international portfolio and investments.

title: Recognized as 'Top Employer in Southeast Asia' by HR Magazine
description: Our dedication to employee wellness and career development earns us a prestigious industry accolade for the third year running.

title: Implementing AI-Driven Analytics to Optimize Supply Chain Logistics
description: New predictive modeling software is being deployed across our entire operational network to boost efficiency and reduce waste.
